channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 13:08 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 13:08 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.#Donetsk_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 12:22 Alarm to Kharkiv Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv District- Kharkiv Territorial Community and Kharkiv Territorial Community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
